column4: I have lost . I can't seem to find my samba sever with my other computer by any name. I have to put its ip in
What I would like to know is how do you find out what use is default for samba ? if you don't set one up ?
I install libdvdcss2 and I can't play dvds .  What player does that work for .  Maybe I don't have the right player to use that
should work for all of them ,  but totem doesn't work well with dvd,  try mplayer vlc or xine
if you are instlling windows to another hdd,  make sure that the windows hdd is set to boot in the bios first,  otherwise it misght mess up your mbr on the ubuntu hdd
do you mean when you install ?
enable encrypton , not sure where but check the settnigs
, what made you say turn on the encryption ?
could be a ISP bittorrent trottleing problem
what makes you ask why I suggested that ?
, that never came to me at all. I really need to read up on bit torrent and networking in general .  So much to know a bit
I use to do quite a bit of support in #utorrent and #azureus and I wrote a few guides for utorrent ,  I have a bit of knowledge in torrent

I have been doing it for years ,but I did it on windows and I did not know much more then forwarding.   Now there is so much to know .  I wondering if it was the program I am use or router or the site

conventionnal wisedom here is that unless you have an specific use for 64 bit version ( like special apps)  use the 32 bit one,  64 bit is still missing some driver support for stuff like nvidia and ati and some wifi , and no flash
